sentences.en: "Last one in the sea is a sissy," proclaimed Idris.
sentences.cn: 伊德里斯大声地宣告说：“在海里，谁落在最后谁就不是爷儿们。”

sentences.en: A gale was blowing and the sea was choppy.
sentences.cn: 狂风大作，海面上波浪起伏。

sentences.en: a little cottage by the sea
sentences.cn: 一座海滨小屋

sentences.en: Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.cn: 庞大的海鸟群是最壮观的景象之一。

sentences.en: Down below them was the sea of upturned faces.
sentences.cn: 他们下面是无数张仰望的脸。

sentences.en: Greenpeace managed to assemble enough boats to waylay the ship at sea.
sentences.cn: 绿色和平组织设法聚集起足够数量的小船在海上拦截该船。

sentences.en: He looked out at the sea of faces.
sentences.cn: 他放眼望去，人海茫茫。

sentences.en: He spent over 30 years at sea .
sentences.cn: 他在船上工作了30多年。

sentences.en: I've had a lifelong fascination with the sea and with small boats.
sentences.cn: 我一生都对大海和小船着迷。

sentences.en: It isn't clear whether the plane went down over land or sea.
sentences.cn: 不清楚飞机是坠毁在陆地上还是海里。

sentences.en: Jay stripped his clothes off and ran into the sea.
sentences.cn: 杰伊脱光衣服奔入海里。

sentences.en: Most exports went by sea .
sentences.cn: 大部分出口商品都走海路。

sentences.en: other army units were sent by sea.
sentences.cn: 其他部队通过海路运送。

sentences.en: The cliffs, lapped by a crystal-clear sea, remind her of Capri.
sentences.cn: 清澈的海水拍打着悬崖峭壁，令她想起了卡普里。

sentences.en: The comparison of her life to a sea voyage simplifies her experience.
sentences.cn: 把她的人生比作一次海上航行不足以说明她丰富的经历。

sentences.en: The sea started to ease as we came under Cuba's lee.
sentences.cn: 我们靠近古巴的背风海岸时风浪开始平息。

sentences.en: The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentences.cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

sentences.en: The ship would lie there mirrored in a perfectly unmoving glossy sea.
sentences.cn: 船会停靠在那里，映衬在一片波澜不兴的湛蓝海水之中。

sentences.en: Their skin was tanned and glowing from their weeks at the sea.
sentences.cn: 他们在海边呆了几个星期，皮肤晒得黝黑发亮。

sentences.en: Then the wind dropped and the surface of the sea was still.
sentences.cn: 后来风势渐弱，海面重归平静。

sentences.en: They stood side by side looking out to sea .
sentences.cn: 他们并排站着眺望大海。

sentences.en: Yemen commands the strait at the southern end of the Red Sea.
sentences.cn: 也门完全控制着红海南端的海峡。

phrases.tran_cn: 茫然，不知所措：处于混乱的或困惑的状态；不知所措
n. 红海（印度洋西北的长形内海，在亚洲阿拉伯半岛同非洲东北部之间）

trans.tran_en: the large area of salty water that covers much of the Earth’s surface
the large area of salty water that covers much of the Earth’s surface
